1.0.name: wordpress/pay-with-a-facebook-post
1.0.description: This plugin enables the system from http://www.paywithafacebookpost.com to work with Wordpress. Pay With a Facebook Post provides an easy to use and free system to pay with a facebook post for digital goods, for example ebooks, songs or movie teasers. All you need to have is an ID from http://www.paywithafacebookpost.com.
